original_title: The Most Beautiful Girl In The World
overview: Fred's birthday is a nightmare. He loses his job, his apartment and his girlfriend (to another woman). Drowning his sorrows in a neighborhood bar, he meets his salvation. Sharon Jackman - The Most Beautiful Girl In The World. She takes him in, gets him a new job and shows him what sex is all about. Only problem is, she's extremely controlling, if he wants it all, he's gonna have to give her everything. Which leaves him with nothing, but everything. What does it gain a man to have the world and lose his soul? That is the question. Sometimes having it all means losing everything.
tagline: What Do You Give The Girl Who Has Everything? A Contract.
title: The Most Beautiful Girl In The World
